trans-unit.source: Specifies a range of pages.
PageRange defines a range of pages that should be processed in an operation such as printing.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRange"></xref> class that includes only the single specified page.
The `page` parameter value is 1-based; page number 1 is the first page.
The page that is printed or processed.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRange"></xref> class with the specified first and last pages.
The `pageFrom` and `PageTo` parameter values are 1-based; page number 1 is the first page.
Since the range includes both the "from" and "to" pages, the total number of pages is "<xref:System.Windows.Controls.PageRange.PageTo%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.PageRange.PageFrom%2A> + 1".
The first page of the range.
The last page of the range.
Tests whether an object of unknown type is equal to this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRange"></xref>.
The object tested.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object is of type <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRange"></xref> and is equal to this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRange"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Tests whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRange"></xref> is equal to this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRange"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRange"></xref> tested.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRange"></xref> objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the hash code value for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRange"></xref>.
The hash code value for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRange"></xref>.
Defines the "==" operator for testing whether two specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRange"></xref> objects are equal.
The first <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRange"></xref>.
The second <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRange"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRange"></xref> objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Defines the "!=" operator for testing whether two specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRange"></xref> objects are *not* equal.
The first <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRange"></xref>.
The second <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRange"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRange"></xref> objects are *not* equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the page number of the first page in the range.
The PageFrom property is 1-based; page number 1 is the first page.
The 1-based page number of the first page in the range.
Gets or sets the page number of the last page in the range.
The PageTo property is 1-based; page number 1 is the first page.
The 1-based page number of the last page in the range.
Gets a string representation of the range.
A string that represents the range of pages in the format "<xref:System.Windows.Controls.PageRange.PageFrom*>`-`<xref:System.Windows.Controls.PageRange.PageTo*>".
